title: G.C.E. Advanced Level (A/L) - Bio Science Stream
description: Successfully complete your A/Ls in the Bio Science stream. Strong results in Biology and Chemistry are fundamental for entry into nursing education programs.

title: Nursing Education & Training
description: Enroll in a government Nursing Training School (NTS) for a Diploma in Nursing, or pursue a BSc in Nursing from a recognized university. This is the core training phase for professional nursing.
institutes: General Sir John Kotelawala Defence University (KDU)

title: Registration and Internship
description: After graduating, you must register with the Sri Lanka Nursing Council (SLNC). You will then complete a period of supervised clinical practice (internship) in a government or recognized private hospital.
institutes: Major Private Hospitals (Asiri, Nawaloka, Hemas, Durdans)

title: Registered Nurse
description: Work as a fully Registered Nurse, providing direct patient care. You can work in various units such as medical, surgical, pediatrics, or emergency departments, gaining broad experience.
qualifications: Confirmed employment as a Registered Nurse

title: Specialization & Senior Roles
description: Pursue postgraduate qualifications or specialized training to advance your career. You can specialize in areas like critical care, theatre nursing, or midwifery. Senior roles include Ward Sister, Nursing Manager, or Tutor.
institutes: N/A - Based on experience and promotion within healthcare institutions
